name: b-e-e-t-l-e
description:
This game was created for Mini Jam 71: Puzzles.

Embark on a strange journey to find your lost beetle. No swords or shields are needed—your keyboard will suffice.

b-e-e-t-l-e is a typing game minus the chaos and the anxiety. Type at your leisure and enjoy a chill, relaxing adventure filled with retro scenery.

(Click on the window if keyboard controls are not responsive at first!)

Art by Viv @emojakeyg (Instagram)
Code & Audio by Paul @PaulSim_ (Twitter)
